title: Microsoft calls cloud gaming ‘immature’ in Activision deal filing
description: A filing to a U.K. regulator around its acquisition of Activision detailed plans for Xbox Game Pass, Call of Duty and cloud gaming.

title: They got a Ring doorbell alert, then opened fire on a bystander, police say
description: After seeing a neighbor on their doorbell camera, a Florida father and son ran outside, looking for an intruder. They shot at a woman sitting in her car, authorities said.

title: Women are the best thing about ‘NHL 23’
description: It's wonderful to see female players getting some shine.

title: People can’t stop turning on their iPhone flashlights by accident
description: People keep turning on their iPhone flashlights, leaving embarrassing lights blazing out of their back pockets. What can we do to fix it?
